title: DesertedLove
description: The story begins with a cruise shipwreck, leaving you, the sole male survivor, on a mysterious beautiful island with 7 girls. Who becomes your true love is entirely up to you.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Deserted Love is a unique interactive dating game. You play as the lone male survivor, stranded with 7 girls on a beautiful island.
<!--text-->
Game Introduction:
"Deserted Love" is a unique interactive romance game. In this adventure full of unknowns and romance, a sudden cruise shipwreck strands tourists on a mysterious and beautiful deserted island. Amid the swaying coconut groves and turquoise waters, the island's exotic charm is irresistible. Players take on the role of the sole male survivor, embarking on an extraordinary survival journey with seven girls. Together, you'll overcome challenges and explore the island's secrets. Along this survival trip, love blossoms unnoticed. Living with the girls day and night, you'll have the chance to delve into their inner worlds and feel their unique charms. Letting love bloom quietly on the island. Who will become your true love on this extraordinary journey? It's all up to you.

Character Introduction：
1. Elegant and mature lady Xu Nuo: A master chef, proficient in cooking and brewing, skilled at making various delicious dishes, she is the culinary expert of the team.
2. Sunny beauty Xia Meng: A cheerleader, incredibly strong, full of energy, confident and responsible, she is the source of vitality in the team.
3. Cute and adorable girl You You: A medical school cutie, skilled in healing and support, with a nurturing nature, she is the team's doctor.
4. Cool and sassy queen Lu Xin: A police academy dropout, skilled in martial arts and various outdoor survival skills, she is the team's physical strength powerhouse.
5. Exotic elf Lin Na: A Tarot card reader, skilled in divination and reasoning, with a meticulous logic and delicate mind, she is the team's prophet.
6. Intellectual goddess Rui Xi: A psychotherapist, loves reading, skilled in hypnosis, she is the team's brainpower.
7. Spicy and lively girl Xiao Ke: A club DJ, master of atmosphere adjustment, with a strong sense of rhythm, she can effectively liven up the team's mood.
8. Mysterious locked girl 1: Sexy blonde white girl Sidney.
9. Mysterious locked girl 2: Cool and quiet black girl Zoe.

Product Features:
1.Pioneering the island romance genre, filmed on location in Hainan with breathtaking scenery!
2.Interact up close with beautiful characters, romance at your fingertips!
3.Various styles of beauties await your pursuit: elegant mature ladies, sunny beauties, cute girls, exotic elves, cool queens, intellectual goddesses, spicy rebels – fulfilling all your fantasies!
4.Two mysterious unlockable girls hidden in the game, waiting for players to explore.
5.Designed for male players, fulfilling the most primal love experience.

The production team's elaboration：
This deserted island romance interactive film game is a brand-new attempt by our team! Unlike traditional interactive film games, we've opted for a tool-based approach without complex game options. We aim for players to immerse themselves in stories of love and desire through visuals. Every scene is meticulously designed, with imagery and sound depicting the sweetness and passion of love, fulfilling players' yearnings for beautiful romance. This game is our new exploration of interactive storytelling, intended to touch players' hearts in the most straightforward way. We hope each player finds their own love story in the game, experiencing a unique and pure emotional journey.
